q: Allen Iverson was voted an All-Star starter by the fans, a selection that has drawn criticism. The former NBA MVP and four-time scoring champion plans to play in his 11th straight All-Star game Feb. 14 at Cowboys Stadium. My fans still support me. You can't ask for more than that, he said. At Facebook, 26-year-old founder and CEO Mark Zuckerberg calls the shots in an entrepreneurial culture that has enticed dozens of engineers to leave Google to work for the social networking company. My goal is to run Google at the pace and with the soul and passion of a startup, Larry Page said in a Thursday interview. Quando il 9 luglio ha ricevuto, come tutti i lavoratori del gruppo, la lettera di Sergio Marchionne , ha deciso di rispondergli altrettanto personalmente. L per l ho pensato di farlo con la mia arma pi forte, il rap; per sarebbe risultato pesante, troppo diretto, didascalico. Allora ho preso carta e penna e ho scritto una lettera, che poi? sta pubblicata da "L'Unit " . Lettera da dipendente, certo; ma nelle cui argomentazioni si intuisce un taglio molto personale, artistico. "It felt funny playing against guys you played with all year," Allen Iverson said. You look left, you look right and there are guys that were alSoulja Boys right there in the foxhole with you, who felt bad when you felt bad. It was tough. Allen Iverson , who scored 40 or more points for the 16th Tim Duncane this season, had 17 in the first quarter and 16 in the third. He made eight straight shots in one stretch and finished 16-of-30.
